summary: This mod adds a \"house\" in rorikstead for the player to live there and storage all his treasures and armors.
descriptionHtml:
Short-Description
This mod adds a \"house\" in rorikstead for the player to live there and storage all his treasures and armors. 

Back Ground Story:
Town people saw a man falling down from the sky west of Rorikstead. He was found at the cliff near Rorikstead. Can you find him and investigate what happened?

Comment:
I didn\'t make a quest because i ve got not much experience in quest making in CK and the house mod is primary to storage all the armor of the player.


Description:

The Sphere contains different rooms:
- Lobby
- Bedroom, Private Storage, Pool, 2 mannequins, Weapon Rack
- Dinner Plateau, Kitchen, Food Storage
- Library, Alchemy & Enchantment Station, Alchemy Garden and Food Plants
- Smithery with all Working Stations, Some Ores to collect
- Storage for all the other things, 10 chests
- 2 female NPCs with AI Package, Essential,Marriable and Follower (Mage and Warrior)

= Big Armory contains (seperated into different spheres for performance reason)
- Guard Armor Showroom a 15 Stations (Male, Female Mannequins(appearance depnds on body mod) and with Storage Chest)
- Heavy Armor Showromm a 20 Stations (Male and Female Mannequins, 6 Slot Weapon Rack and with Storage Chest)
- Light Armor Showromm a 20 Stations (Same as above)
- Unique Armor Showromm a 20 Stations (Same as above)
- Robe Showroom a 15 Stations (same as Guard Armor Showroom)
- Clothes Showroom a 15 Stations (same as Guard Armor Showroom)
- Addon Armor Showroom a 20 Stations (for Additional Armors by Modders and/or Bethesda Addons)
- Addon Armor Showroom 2 a 20 Stations 
		=Summary of 145 Stations 

Specific Properties
- Complete handmade Navmesh
- All containers are safe and non-respawn
- Player Owned (but not overpowered with high level armor or weapons)


Installation:
Add the data into your skyrim data



IMPORTANT:
This is initial release of Paranormal Sphere. I ve tested everything many times, but i can\'t guarantee perfect working. So Back up your Save Game and explore it. Feel free to comment (hopefully good) and rate
author: Just Eddy
